Interface User

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Consumer, Producer

    public interface User
    Interface to classify all types of users and define common methods to be implemented in them
    Author:
    Sheikh Faisal Anwar, Vanja Veselnovic, Nicholas Robidoux, Mohammed Kashif Siddiqui

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act(Simulator n, SimulatorFrame gui)
      Method that describes what tasks the user has to perform when it is selected Mainly search and like a document For a Producer this method also creates a new document
      void addFollower(User user)
      Method add the some user that followed the current user object to the array list record
      void follow(User user)
      Ability to follow a certain user Add user to the list of other users being followed by this user
      ArrayList<User> getFollowers()
      Method to display the people currently following

      method to display users followed
      ArrayList<Document> getLiked()
      Method to display documents liked

      Getter for user's name
      int getNumFollowers()

      ArrayList<Integer> getPayoff()

      1st search algorithm implemented

      • search

        DefaultListModel<Document> search(DefaultListModel<Document> d,
                                  int k,
                                  SimulatorFrame gui)
        1st search algorithm implemented
        Parameters:
        d: - List of documents being searched
        k: - Top k documents desired by the user
        gui: - frame in which simulation is taking place
        Returns:
        List of Documents matching search criteria

      • act

        void act(Simulator n,
         SimulatorFrame gui)
        Method that describes what tasks the user has to perform when it is selected Mainly search and like a document For a Producer this method also creates a new document
        Parameters:
        n: - Simulation environment in which act is being implemented
        gui: - Frame in which act is being implemented
